short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and edit Topicflow meeting notes in Google Meet. Transcribe meeting in Topicflow to enable AI summarization and suggestions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform meetings into results-driven conversations.

- Prepare: Prepare for meetings with AI summarization of past meetings and templates.
- Meet: Run effective meetings and capture the next steps with transcription.
- Act: Drive accountability by tracking action items and progress on goals / OKRs.
- Assess: Gain insights into your team's performance and coach them for success.
